title: AP source: Don Mattingly out as LA Dodgers manager
text: Will the Los Angeles Dodgers Fire Don Mattingly? 01:01 Despite making the MLB playoffs for the third straight season, the Los Angeles Dodgers were eliminated in the National League Divisional Round by the New York Mets. Dodgers manager Don Mattingly is an old school coach who many new-school baseball minds believe makes questionable decisions when it... Other recent news in U.S. Sports: MLB
